summary: All three requirements (REQ-19, REQ-20, REQ-21) have been successfully implemented according to the BuildRequest. The About section was created and positioned correctly, the header logo received a white border, and the logo mockup image was added to the portfolio gallery with proper styling and positioning.

hallucinated_features.description: Added 'About' navigation button to the Header component
hallucinated_features.reason: The BuildRequest explicitly states in non-goals: 'Adding new navigation menu items'. The diff shows a new About navigation button was added to Header.tsx.
